item.description: September Newsletter Room 302 Monday, September 24th, 2018 Dear Parents, Thank you very much for signing up to assist with our laundry, flower arrangement, and community snack program. Thank you also so much for purchasing materials for our class to use from our Amazon wish list. Your support helps and keeps our classroom a joyous learning place for the students to work. Thank you also for having your child bring milk cartons to our classroom.

August Newsletter Room 302 Monday, August 27, 2018 Dear Parents, Welcome back to school! Thank you very much for coming to our Open House and /or Back to School Night last week. It was great to meet and see you all. I am looking forward to working with you this year.
